name: leveldb.org
description: This is the source code for [leveldb.org](leveldb.org).

scripts.start: npm run watch-styles & npm run watch-jade & npm run server
scripts.deploy: npm run build-styles && npm run build-jade && npm run git-deploy
scripts.git-finish: git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master
scripts.git-deploy: npm run git-checkout && npm run git-commit && npm run git-finish

author: hij1nx
